description_en: This dataset provides a summary of statistics for all parliamentary seats in Malaysia, including voter turnout, majority, and other election-related metrics. It is a comprehensive resource for understanding electoral outcomes at the national level.
description_ms: Dataset ini menyediakan ringkasan statistik untuk semua kerusi parlimen di Malaysia, termasuk peratusan pengundi, majoriti, dan metrik berkaitan pilihan raya lain. Ia adalah sumber yang komprehensif untuk memahami keputusan pilihan raya di peringkat nasional.
methodology_en: The dataset compiles data from federal elections in Malaysia, capturing key statistics such as voter turnout, total voters, ballots issued, and majority percentages for each parliamentary seat. Data is collected from official election results and is presented at the national level. The dataset is a one-off compilation and does not include updates or changes post-publication.
methodology_ms: Dataset ini mengumpulkan data dari pilihan raya persekutuan di Malaysia, merangkumi statistik utama seperti peratusan pengundi, jumlah pengundi, kertas undi yang dikeluarkan, dan peratusan majoriti bagi setiap kerusi parlimen. Data dikumpulkan dari keputusan rasmi pilihan raya dan dipersembahkan di peringkat nasional. Dataset ini adalah kompilasi sekali sahaja dan tidak termasuk kemas kini atau perubahan selepas penerbitan.
caveat_en: The dataset is based on historical election data and may not reflect any changes or updates post-publication. Some figures may not add up exactly due to rounding.
caveat_ms: Dataset ini berdasarkan data pilihan raya sejarah dan mungkin tidak mencerminkan sebarang perubahan atau kemas kini selepas penerbitan. Beberapa angka mungkin tidak tepat kerana pembundaran.

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: The date of the election in YYYY-MM-DD format.
fields.description_ms: Tarikh pilihan raya dalam format YYYY-MM-DD.

fields.name: election
fields.description_en: The general election identifier, indicating the specific election event (e.g., GE-11 for the 11th General Election).
fields.description_ms: Pengenal pilihan raya umum, menunjukkan acara pilihan raya tertentu (contohnya, GE-11 untuk Pilihan Raya Umum ke-11).

fields.name: state
fields.description_en: The state in which the parliamentary seat is located.
fields.description_ms: Negeri di mana kerusi parlimen terletak.

fields.name: seat
fields.description_en: The name of the parliamentary seat.

fields.name: voters_total
fields.description_en: The total number of registered voters for the seat.
fields.description_ms: Jumlah pengundi berdaftar untuk kerusi tersebut.

fields.name: ballots_issued
fields.description_en: The total number of ballots issued during the election.
fields.description_ms: Jumlah kertas undi yang dikeluarkan semasa pilihan raya.

fields.name: ballots_not_returned
fields.description_en: The number of ballots issued but not returned.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan kertas undi yang dikeluarkan tetapi tidak dikembalikan.

fields.name: votes_rejected
fields.description_en: The number of votes that were rejected during counting.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan undi yang ditolak semasa pengiraan.

fields.name: votes_valid
fields.description_en: The number of votes counted as valid.
fields.description_ms: Bilangan undi yang dikira sebagai sah.

fields.name: majority
fields.description_en: The majority by which the winning candidate won the seat.
fields.description_ms: Majoriti di mana calon yang menang memenangi kerusi tersebut.

fields.name: voter_turnout
fields.description_en: The percentage of total voters who cast their votes.

fields.name: majority_perc
fields.description_en: The percentage of the majority relative to total valid votes.
fields.description_ms: Peratusan majoriti berbanding dengan jumlah undi sah.

fields.name: votes_rejected_perc
fields.description_en: The percentage of rejected votes relative to total ballots issued.
fields.description_ms: Peratusan undi ditolak berbanding dengan jumlah kertas undi dikeluarkan.

fields.name: ballots_not_returned_perc
fields.description_en: The percentage of ballots not returned relative to total ballots issued.
fields.description_ms: Peratusan kertas undi tidak dikembalikan berbanding dengan jumlah kertas undi dikeluarkan.
